name: Paper Worlds 2
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

Use the arrow keys to move. And drag the blocks to place them. Use Space or Up arrow to jump.

Paper Worlds 1: https://gamejolt.com/games/paperworlds/622408

CREDITS:

The music used in this game is owned by: SEGA

Title Screen: Sonic 3D Blast: Opening

Menu: Sonic CD Menu

Paper Studio: Green Hill Remix & Marble Zone Remix

Game created by: 

@TheAwsomeBoii 

 @Papichi05 

PLOT:

After Clankton defeated Nega-Sonic he went to rest in his bed and help the villagers fix their homes. Clankton dozed off into sleep. He soon found himself in a world. A dream world. A world where he could do ANYTHING. Welcome to Paper Worlds 2.
